query: I receive Attendance Allowance but my care needs have increased in barnet. Can the council provide additional financial support?

N.15. Getting help from the Council  
Barnet Council aims to promote peoples independence and will only recommend a 
placement in a care home where there are no other support options available to 
enable someone to stay within their own home. If this is the case for you or your 
family member and  your savings and capital are less than £23,250, you should 
qualify for financial assistance from Barnet Council. You will need to complete a 
form to help us work out how much you must pay and how much the Council should 
contribute. We call this a Financia l Assessment and we will ask you to provide 
details of your income and capital or savings.  
 
If you do not qualify for assistance from the council, you can contact My Care My 
Home on 0800 731 8470 or visit www.mycaremyhome.co.uk  for advice on options 
for funding your care.  
 
N.16. How is the Financial Assessment carried out?

answer:
If your care needs have increased in Barnet, you may qualify for additional financial support from Barnet Council, depending on your financial situation.

- **Eligibility for Financial Assistance**: If your savings and capital are less than £23,250, you should qualify for financial assistance from Barnet Council. You will need to complete a Financial Assessment to determine how much the Council can contribute towards your care costs.

- **Financial Assessment Process**: The Council will ask you to provide details of your income, capital, or savings. This assessment will help determine your contribution towards the cost of your support. The Council aims to complete this assessment within 5 working days after receiving your completed Financial Declaration Form and supporting documents.

- **Household Support Fund**: Additionally, the Household Support Fund is available to help with rising living costs, such as food and energy bills. This fund is intended for households most in need, including pensioners. You can find more information about this fund and how to apply by visiting the Barnet Council's website or contacting them directly.

For further assistance or to apply for financial support, you can contact Barnet Council or visit their website at [Barnet Council Adult Social Care](https://www.barnet.gov.uk/adult-social-care/i-am-carer-family-member-or-friend-someone-adult-social-care/i-want-know-whats-0). If you do not qualify for council assistance, you can also contact My Care My Home at 0800 731 8470 or visit [My Care My Home](http://www.mycaremyhome.co.uk) for advice on funding options.
